title: Executive Order 5543-Power-Site Restoration No. 459, Idaho
content: So much of Executive order of June 27, 1912, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 283, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 9 S., R. 14 E., sec. 11, lot 3.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5543-Power-Site Restoration No. 459, Idaho Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361178
